import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_1965_a2
: ∀ n > 0, ∑ r ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ((n - 1)/2), ((n - 2*r) * Nat.choose n r / (n : ℚ))^2 = (Nat.choose (2*n - 2) (n - 1))/(n : ℚ) := by
  intro n hn
  have h1 : ∀ n > 0, ∑ r ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ((n - 1)/2), ((n - 2*r) * Nat.choose n r / (n : ℚ))^2 = (Nat.choose (2*n - 2) (n - 1))/(n : ℚ) := by
    intro n hn
    induction n with
    | zero => contradiction
    | succ n ih =>
      cases n with
      | zero =>
        norm_num [Nat.choose, Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top]
        <;> field_simp
        <;> ring_nf
        <;> norm_num
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt, Nat.succ_le_iff]
        <;> field_simp [Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.mul_div_assoc, Nat.mul_div_cancel_left] at *
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> norm_num at *
        <;> nlinarith
  exact h1 n hn
